item.title: Building a Deep Learning Image Classifier with Keras using R 🤖️💻📷🖼️
item.description: Image classification is the process of labeling images based on specific characteristics or features that they contain. The algorithm recognizes these qualities and utilizes them to distinguish between images and assign labels to them. CNNs are used in deep learning image classification models for image recognition, image classification, object detection, and other similar tasks. In this article, I share a step-by-step approach to build a Keras deep learning image classifier using R.
